TestCase.name: testCorrelateWithMultiFilter
TestCase.Resource: LogicalProject(c=[$0], d=[$1]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[>($2, 20)]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[>($2, 10)]) +- LogicalProject(c=[$2], d=[$3], e=[$4]) +- LogicalCorrelate(correlation=[$cor0], joinType=[inner], requiredColumns=[{}]) :- LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1], c=[$2]) : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[_DataStreamTable_0]]) +- LogicalTableFunctionScan(invocation=[org$apache$flink$table$util$TableFunc0$dc6cc2ed0170230e48bad104d706a881($2)], rowType=[RecordType(VARCHAR(65536) d, INTEGER e)], elementType=[class [Ljava.lang.Object;])

Correlate(invocation=[org$apache$flink$table$util$TableFunc0$dc6cc2ed0170230e48bad104d706a881($2)], correlate=[table(TableFunc0(c))], select=[c,d], rowType=[RecordType(VARCHAR(65536) c, VARCHAR(65536) d)], joinType=[INNER], condition=[>($1, 20)]) +- BoundedStreamScan(table=[[_DataStreamTable_0]], fields=[a, b, c])

TestCase.name: testCorrelateAfterConcatAggWithConstantParam
TestCase.Resource: LogicalCorrelate(correlation=[$cor0], joinType=[inner], requiredColumns=[{}]) :- LogicalProject(a=[AS($1, 'a')]) : +- LogicalAggregate(group=[{1}], TMP_0=[CONCAT_AGG($2, $0)]) : +- LogicalProject(a=[$0], $f1=[5], $f2=['#']) : +- LogicalProject(a=[$0]) : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[_DataStreamTable_0]]) +- LogicalTableFunctionScan(invocation=[org$apache$flink$table$util$TableFunc0$dc6cc2ed0170230e48bad104d706a881($0)], rowType=[RecordType(VARCHAR(65536) name, INTEGER age)], elementType=[class [Ljava.lang.Object;])

Correlate(invocation=[org$apache$flink$table$util$TableFunc0$dc6cc2ed0170230e48bad104d706a881($0)], correlate=[table(TableFunc0(a))], select=[a,name,age], rowType=[RecordType(VARCHAR(65536) a, VARCHAR(65536) name, INTEGER age)], joinType=[INNER]) +- Calc(select=[TMP_0 AS a]) +- SortAggregate(isMerge=[true], groupBy=[$f1], select=[$f1, Final_CONCAT_AGG(accDelimiter$0, concatAcc$1) AS TMP_0]) +- Sort(orderBy=[$f1 ASC]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[$f1]]) +- LocalSortAggregate(groupBy=[$f1], select=[$f1, Partial_CONCAT_AGG($f2, a) AS (accDelimiter$0, concatAcc$1)]) +- Sort(orderBy=[$f1 ASC]) +- Calc(select=[a, 5 AS $f1, '#' AS $f2]) +- BoundedStreamScan(table=[[_DataStreamTable_0]], fields=[a])

TestCase.name: testCrossJoin
TestCase.Resource: LogicalProject(c=[$2], s=[$3]) +- LogicalCorrelate(correlation=[$cor0], joinType=[inner], requiredColumns=[{}]) :- LogicalTableScan(table=[[_DataStreamTable_0]]) +- LogicalTableFunctionScan(invocation=[org$apache$flink$table$util$TableFunc1$a21e8dfcd8c7a080ac415a4a86de8b95($2)], rowType=[RecordType(VARCHAR(65536) s)], elementType=[class [Ljava.lang.Object;])

Correlate(invocation=[org$apache$flink$table$util$TableFunc1$a21e8dfcd8c7a080ac415a4a86de8b95($2)], correlate=[table(TableFunc1(c))], select=[c,s], rowType=[RecordType(VARCHAR(65536) c, VARCHAR(65536) s)], joinType=[INNER]) +- BoundedStreamScan(table=[[_DataStreamTable_0]], fields=[a, b, c])

TestCase.name: testCrossJoin2
TestCase.Resource: LogicalProject(c=[$2], s=[$3]) +- LogicalCorrelate(correlation=[$cor0], joinType=[inner], requiredColumns=[{}]) :- LogicalTableScan(table=[[_DataStreamTable_0]]) +- LogicalTableFunctionScan(invocation=[org$apache$flink$table$util$TableFunc1$a21e8dfcd8c7a080ac415a4a86de8b95($2, '$')], rowType=[RecordType(VARCHAR(65536) s)], elementType=[class [Ljava.lang.Object;])

Correlate(invocation=[org$apache$flink$table$util$TableFunc1$a21e8dfcd8c7a080ac415a4a86de8b95($2, '$')], correlate=[table(TableFunc1(c,'$'))], select=[c,s], rowType=[RecordType(VARCHAR(65536) c, VARCHAR(65536) s)], joinType=[INNER]) +- BoundedStreamScan(table=[[_DataStreamTable_0]], fields=[a, b, c])

TestCase.name: testLeftOuterJoinWithoutJoinPredicates
TestCase.Resource: LogicalFilter(condition=[>($1, '')]) +- LogicalProject(c=[$2], s=[$3]) +- LogicalCorrelate(correlation=[$cor0], joinType=[left], requiredColumns=[{}]) :- LogicalTableScan(table=[[_DataStreamTable_0]]) +- LogicalTableFunctionScan(invocation=[org$apache$flink$table$util$TableFunc1$a21e8dfcd8c7a080ac415a4a86de8b95($2)], rowType=[RecordType(VARCHAR(65536) s)], elementType=[class [Ljava.lang.Object;])

Calc(select=[c, s], where=[>(s, '')]) +- Correlate(invocation=[org$apache$flink$table$util$TableFunc1$a21e8dfcd8c7a080ac415a4a86de8b95($2)], correlate=[table(TableFunc1(c))], select=[c,s], rowType=[RecordType(VARCHAR(65536) c, VARCHAR(65536) s)], joinType=[LEFT]) +- BoundedStreamScan(table=[[_DataStreamTable_0]], fields=[a, b, c])
